name: EVERRAGE!
description:
Originally made in 2 days as a part of a challenge, In this bloody game you can tear through the bad guys using your upgradable handy gun!

INCREASE YOUR DEADLINESS POWERFUL POWERUPS PAINT WITH THE BLOOD OF YOUR ENEMIES AND SURVIVE AS LONG AS YOU CAN

( Don't forget to share your score with us in the Discord server ;) )

As mentioned, this is originally a product of just 2 days, so your feedback is really appreciated, If you have any suggestions do let me know, it'll shape the future updates :)
